job.title: Junior Site Reliability Engineer-Citi Technology Infrastructure
job.description: Job Id: 21267690<br><br>We are looking for a motivated Junior Site Reliability Engineer who prefers to live on the cutting edge of cloud infrastructure management, Application Performance Management (APM), and Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC).<br><br>An ideal candidate would have both software engineering experience as well as DevOps/Sysadmin experience however we are open to anyone passionate about creating organized, efficient, and scalable cloud infrastructure which is easy to deploy and maintain.<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities:<br></u></strong><ul><li>Provision new infrastructure and monitor existing one</li><li>Set up automated mechanisms that spot issues early</li><li>Configure alarms and alerts to find any performance issues</li><li>Assist the team with technology selection</li><li>Front-line for Production monitoring + response in case of issues</li><li>Works on the design of new features / functionality to ensure Security + Resiliency + Monitoring are baked into every release.</li><li>Works with the team on releases<br></li></ul><strong><u>Qualifications:<br></u></strong><ul><li>1 year of experience as SRE, software engineer, or systems administrator</li><li>Comfortable working with Docker / Containers</li><li>Experience with coding in any language</li><li>Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery and APM implementation experience</li><li>Consistently demonstrates clear and concise written and verbal communication</li><li>Demonstrated problem-solving and decision-making skills</li><li>Ability to work under pressure and manage deadlines or unexpected changes in expectations or requirements<br></li></ul><strong><u>Education:<br></u></strong><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree/University degree or equivalent experience<br></li></ul>This job description provides a high-level review of the types of work performed.
